segments.text: That China-gown of Tang-Dynasty style is so beautiful . Would you show it to me , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please do , the fitting-room is over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It feels a little tight around the waist . Do you have a bigger one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . We don't have this color in your size . We have some green ones in your size . Would you please have a look at this green one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . How much does it cost ?
segments.speaker: S1
